comment.author: 8833545@N03
comment._content: Thanks for adding your picture to the 'Cambus O' May To Braemar' Group. A Ballater Village local has noted that there is a 'cradle' type facility to cross the River Dee (see note). Later it was replaced by a suspension bridge (1885) that is still in situ now, though unsafe. A non confirmed report is that someone was drowned when using the 'cradle' version shown above. MORE ABOUT ABERGELDIE CASTLE
